repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:14.04

RUN apt-get update -y && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y git bash-completion dnsutils nginx telnet lsof && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN git clone https://github.com/letsencrypt/letsencrypt
RUN cd letsencrypt && ./letsencrypt-auto --help

EXPOSE 443
# WORKDIR ~

CMD bash
